scripts.setup: pnpm i && pnpm run build:logger && pnpm run build:data-ops
scripts.deploy:yeko-core: pnpm run build:data-ops && pnpm run build:logger && pnpm run --filter yeko-core deploy
scripts.deploy:yeko-school: pnpm run build:data-ops && pnpm run build:logger && pnpm run --filter yeko-school deploy
scripts.deploy:yeko-teacher: pnpm run build:data-ops && pnpm run build:logger && pnpm run --filter yeko-teacher deploy
scripts.deploy:data-service: pnpm run build:data-ops && pnpm run build:logger && pnpm run --filter data-service deploy
scripts.deploy:queue-worker: pnpm run build:data-ops && pnpm run --filter @repo/queue-worker deploy
scripts.test: pnpm run --filter "*" test || echo "No test script found"
